title: Excellent

title: Good quality product
review:
Pretty good!

Ok lets focus on the fact that people are posting reviews about this product saying it's bad or just ok and more lemme tell you been analysing this earphones for a while, the build quality is good, tangled free flat cords, the curve shaped design for better sound reachability trough ear canal. 

Inside the box:-
1)Earphones itself with medium earbuds equipped right of the box. 
2) Extra earbuds.
3)Warranty card and user manual.

Pros:-
1) Good quality as expected from JBL.
2)Tangled free cable.
3)Angled headphone jack for better protection from breaking off due to bending.
4) Bass is really powerful, you will hear the punchiness right in ur eardrums. Good for metal, rock, dubstep, electro house and other heavy bass loaded music  genre.

Cons:-
1) cable is slightly thin which makes it fragile and makes me worry more i might break it but it's  not that much of a problem.
2) Little bit expensive.  would have been good if it was under 900 but ehhh 1095 rs. Is fine but still

Conclusion :-
Overall just go for it guys! Its pretty good deal and good quality product invest in good things rather than cheap ones 

*** All of the above information is my observation and opinions the experience might vary person to person *** 

Thanks for taking the time and reading all of this if you liked my review give it a thumbs up would encourage me to post more reviews about it till then peace ✌️...

title: Worst experience ever!
review:
In bought jbl t110 from flipkart on 19-8-2017 
After that I given it to service center  at parel in mumbai on 28 Sept now they told me to accept jbl c100si 
Why should I accept it i bought t110 for 1300 inr and you giving me product worth rs. 700 it lack of build quality why should I take it as replacement

title: Brilliant
review: Excellent product. Treble a bit on higher side for my liking, but you can adjust it through the equaliser of your device. Go for it.

title: Good bass, good sound calrity.
review: I bought these earphones 15 days back, and I've liked it's performance overall. It has a good bass, much better than C100si. The sound clarity is good. The best part is they don't tangle. Totally worth the money if looking for a good earphone to buy.

title: Mind-blowing purchase
review:
If u r looking for good bass and clarity with a price of Rs 1200 JBL is what u can go for.
Earlier i was using Sony earphones worth Rs 3799 which lasted for almost 3 years and now as those ones got damaged I was so confused which one to pick..
Picked JBL and was quite surprised by the good built quality of the headphone and music clarity..

title: Not worth the money
review:
The sound quality is nothing special..  I wouldn't pay more than 600 bucks for this product :/
Been using it for the past 4 months and today morning the left side stopped working :( will call the service center tomorrow morning see what happens..

title: Excellent Choice 4 Quality Lovers
review:
Kudos To Flipkart 4 Early Delivery And Excellent Packaging! Coming to the Earphones, ITS JBL - The Name's Enough to express its quality.. The headsets are durable and clarity is excellent.. The bass could have been more louder by default but you can increase it by some tweaks in your equalizer.. 

1 Tip 4 Last - These Headphones work like charm with Dolby Atmos Running Phones.. :)
